name: smartTV
0:
”alexa,volume up on tv”
”alexa,launch youtube on tv”
”alexa,wake up”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Please make sure your c4l2 hardware is inserted in TV ,and then launch alexa app in your TV and sign in your amazon account. After a while ,a serials of number will be shown on TV, you need to log in the website :https://amazon.com/us/code ,and input the number . Through these steps, your TV will register to your account ,and try to use your alexa app in your phone to discover and add the TV.
